aboutP1.defaultMessage: I'm Alberto Bas, a defi developer from Spain. I've written this page to gather and publish some work and projects mainly about cryptography, blockchain and data science.

aboutP2.defaultMessage: I try to cover concepts like <smartcontracts></smartcontracts>, flash loans and swaps, crypto wallets, ZK-SNARKs and others mostly about <defi></defi> generally coding decentralized applications which I usually develop using <reactjs></reactjs> components and <typescript></typescript>, sometimes using <nextjs></nextjs>. I code smart contracts in <solidity></solidity> and Vyper. The development environments I usually use are <hardhat></hardhat> and Brownie.

aboutP3.defaultMessage: In regards to data science, I have knowledge of parametric and non-parametric modeling in <supervisedlearning></supervisedlearning>, and of clustering and PCA techniques in unsupervised learning. I usually code in <python></python> and use libraries such as <scikitlearn></scikitlearn>, <xgboost></xgboost>, <lightgbm></lightgbm>. I have experience of implementing and optimizing feed-forward and <cnn></cnn> as well as recurrent (<lstm></lstm>, <gru></gru>) and recursive networks. I primarily use <pytorch></pytorch> but also TensorFlow and Keras. I perform <eda></eda> using python libraries (<pandas></pandas>, <numpy></numpy>, <scipy></scipy>, <matplotlib></matplotlib> and <seaborn></seaborn>).

aboutP4.defaultMessage: You can contact me by <email></email> and on <github></github> and <linkedin></linkedin>.

blogDescription.defaultMessage: Blog about cryptography, blockchain and data science

footerWebNote.defaultMessage: This webpage does not track you. It is <openSource></openSource>.

introSectionH1.defaultMessage: A page about blockchain, data science and Web3

introSectionP.defaultMessage: Hi!, I'm Alberto Bas, a DeFi developer by profession and telecommunications technical engineer by training. I post in this page some <projects></projects> and <blog></blog> about cryptography, blockchain, and data science.
